giant.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: extremely big, and much bigger than other things of the same type
giant.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: an extremely tall strong man, who is often bad and cruel, in children’s stories
giant.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a very big man, animal, or plant
giant.translation[1].definitions[3].defi: someone who is very good at doing something
giant.translation[1].definitions[3].exam: Miles Davis, truly one of the giants of jazz
giant.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: The world’s soft drinks market is dominated by the US giants, Pepsi and Coke.
ICI, the chemicals giant, paid $193 million to buy an American explosives manufacturer.
giant organisations like IBM and Shell
